attributes.action: Ensure that the proposed restruture of Special Educational Needs schools  in South Tyneside will not result in the closure of all  facilities in Jarrow and Hebburn to the detriment of the students currently attending these sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While accepting the need for a restructure of SEN education in the area we are concerned that the proposals will result in the closure of sites in Jarrow and Hebburn ( in particular Epinay Business and Enterprise School ) forcing those currently attending these facilities to move to sites in South Shields . For those students in SEN schools  stability and consistancy provide the basis for development and confidence .Any disruption must be kept to a minimum and by retaining a site in Jarrow/ Hebburn this can be achieved.
